      void setStepPanelState(boolean enabled)
      Two states can be set by parameter "enabled":
      true: sets step panel to initial state and sets step iterator to first element (if step iterator is not null)
      false: disables step panel (all button models) and clears step iterator
      void setStoppedState()

      The save graph button model is only enabled when:
      there is no existing graphFile or the graph is unsaved.

      Popups are enabed only when there is not editing mode selected.

      void updateStepPanelModels()
      Precondition: stepIterator not null
      Updates the step panel models with the current stepIterator values.

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers()
        Description copied from interface: IAppModel
        If this object has changed, as indicated by the hasChanged method, then notify all of its observers and then call the clearChanged method to indicate that this object has no longer changed. Each observer has its update method called with two arguments: this observable object and null. In other words, this method is equivalent to: notifyObservers(null)
        Specified by:
        notifyObservers in interface IAppModel
        Overrides:
        notifyObservers in class Observable

      • setStepPanelState

        public void setStepPanelState(boolean enabled)
                       throws BadLocationException
        Description copied from interface: IAppModel
        Two states can be set by parameter "enabled":
        true: sets step panel to initial state and sets step iterator to first element (if step iterator is not null)
        false: disables step panel (all button models) and clears step iterator
        Specified by:
        setStepPanelState in interface IAppModel
        Throws:
        BadLocationException

      • updateMenuToolbarModels

        private void updateMenuToolbarModels()
        The save graph button model is only enabled when:
        there is no existing graphFile or the graph is unsaved.
        The newCalcButtonModel is only enabled when edited calculation is possible.

      • updatePopupModels

        private void updatePopupModels()
        Popups are enabed only when there is not editing mode selected.
